TeamTeleport

A team-based teleport-plugin.

View project onGitHub

Welcome.

TeamTeleport is an open source plugin for Minecraft bukkit-servers, that allows players to teleport only between specified team members. Great for teamed pvp-servers.

The plugin is maintained on dev.bukkit.org.

View project onBukkit.org

is maintained by statistician.
